summary: This document is a set of daily lieutenant's logs from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for July 24, 2019, detailing routine prison operations and inmate statuses. The most significant entry notes that inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was removed from suicide watch and placed on psychological observation on that date.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054. The log notes he was initially on suicide watch and was removed from suicide watch to psychological observation on July 24, 2019.

persons.name: Ayllon
persons.context: Inmate #86268-054 who was removed from the facility at 4:00 AM on July 24, 2019, via a USP Canaan bus.

persons.name: Reese
persons.context: Inmate #43667-007 who was removed from the facility at 4:00 AM on July 24, 2019, via a USP Canaan bus.

persons.name: Goswami
persons.context: Inmate #75954-054 who was taken out to court at 12:35 PM on July 24, 2019.

persons.name: Martinez
persons.context: Two inmates with the surname Martinez are mentioned. One (#85976-054) was taken to and returned from the local hospital. Another (#27758-050) was taken out to the local hospital.

persons.name: Noble
persons.context: Inmate #78838-054 who was part of a group of two inmates removed at 1:05 PM on July 24, 2019.

persons.name: Wright
persons.context: Inmate #84115-083 who was part of a group of two inmates removed at 1:05 PM on July 24, 2019.

persons.name: Hallwood
persons.context: Newly committed inmate #63577-054 received at 6:30 PM on July 22, 2019, as noted in a log entry from that date.

persons.name: Latimer
persons.context: Newly committed inmate #79427-054 received at 6:30 PM on July 22, 2019, and later placed in Administrative Detention for 'CIMS CONCERN'.

persons.name: Rosa
persons.context: Inmate #86324-054 who was escorted from GN to ZA at 9:00 PM on July 22, 2019, and placed in Administrative Detention.

persons.name: Urena
persons.context: Inmate #28631-054 who was escorted from GN to ZA at 9:00 PM on July 22, 2019, and placed in Administrative Detention for multiple infractions (104, 108, 331).

events.title: Epstein Removed from Suicide Watch
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was removed from suicide watch and placed on psychological observation at 11:10 AM.

events.title: Routine Prison Operations and Counts
events.description: Multiple institutional counts, body alarm tests, and routine checks were conducted throughout the day and night shifts at the MCC.

events.title: Inmates Placed in Administrative Detention
events.description: Inmates Rosa, Urena, and Latimer were placed in Administrative Detention on the evening of July 22, 2019, for various infractions including possession of contraband.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was on suicide watch and was removed from it, being placed on psychological observation on July 24, 2019.
The prison's fire alarm and sprinkler systems were reported as inoperable, requiring a fire watch to be in progress.
The logs document routine prison operations including inmate counts, transfers, court appearances, and hospital visits for various inmates.
An inmate at a 'Goldcrest nursing facility' was under guard by the USMS, indicating a prisoner receiving external medical care.
Contraband including a phone charger, cable, sharpened weapon, and amphetamines was found during an inmate escort on July 22, 2019.
